project_abstract.cdata: The Second Fujian Highway Project aims to increase economic activity along the Fuzhou-Shenzhen high-priority transport corridor through relieving congestion, facilitating trade and mobility, and helping increase efficiency and traffic safety in Southern Fujian. There are three project components. The first component constructs an expressway, a divided, four-lane, access-controlled toll highway; interchanges; service areas providing facilities for refueling and vehicle repair, restaurants, parking and rest stops; facilities for expressway administration and maintenance; and electrical and mechanical installations for toll collection, traffic monitoring, telecommunications and tunnel lighting, and all interchanges and annex areas. This component also improves existing and constructs interconnecting roads as well as other roads, provides equipment, and funds construction supervision services. The second component funds studies and technical assistance in highway maintenance management, and toll rates and road safety; and designs an institutional development plan. This component also trains staff in programs covering all aspects of highway planning, design, construction, operation, finance, and maintenance. The third component supports a front-end fee while the fourth component finances land acquisition and resettlement mainly through providing compensation at replacement cost and subsidies.

P051705.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>第二福建公路项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>项目提供贷款2亿美元，用于漳州至诏安140公里高速公路的建设，该高速公路是从福建省的福州到广东省的深圳之间国道主干线沿海交通走廊的重要路段。漳州－诏安高速公路建成后将把福建和广东的公路系统连接起来，促进两地的经济、商贸和旅游业发展，为沿线地区1000万人口服务。此外该项目还注重公路养护和交通安全问题。该项目还投资对该地区其他公路的路面状况和安全设施加以改善。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
